pages.text: Chalk is used in [Circle Rites] in order to help focus and channel power. The Chalk Circles draws are just as important as the reagents used in the rite.
The first form of chalk, both used on its own and as a base for the other chalks.
The heart of any circle ritual.
Used for rituals of a more diabolic nature.
Used for rituals that require communication with other dimensions or across large areas.
